records.subcategory:
### Phase 5: Judicial Enforcement
**Court Venue**: Circuit court in jurisdiction where records locat
records.description:
### Phase 5: Judicial Enforcement
**Court Venue**: Circuit court in jurisdiction where records located
**Legal Standard**: Mandamus action to compel disclosure
**Attorney Fees**: Not provided under Virginia FOIA
**Timeline**: 6-12 months typical for resolution

records.subcategory: : Must go directly to circuit court
records.description: : Must go directly to circuit court
records.conditions: : Must go directly to circuit court

records.subcategory: : Expensive litigation with no cost recovery
